id.description: Unique identifier for the ad account

name.description: The name of the ad account

owner.description: Details of the ad account owner

country.description: The country associated with the ad account

currency.description: The currency used for billing in the ad account

updated_time.description: The timestamp showing when the ad account was last updated

created_time.description: The timestamp showing when the ad account was created

permissions.description: Permissions assigned to the ad account
